pages.title: Blood Orchid Petals
pages.text: These leaves seem to belong to a flower you don't know. Did it once bloom here, was it once grown by those who came before you and built these structures you found? Perhaps they are a souvenir from a world you yourself have never entered? Yet it looks like it was plucked just 5 minutes ago.$(br)You feel something whenever you touch the petal. Restlessness.

pages.title: Workshop Recipe
pages.text: With the help of $(l:magical_blocks/potion_workshop)Potion Workshop$(/l) and $(l:resources/quitoxic_reeds#quitoxic_powder)Quitoxic Powder$(/l), aroma and active ingredients can be extracted from a single petal into a thick Solution. While it almost smells like Rose Water, it's effect when drunk is definitely... $(italic)a little more effervescent$().

pages.title: Blood Orchid Plants
pages.text: Creates a plant from a single petal which new petals can be plucked of
